control, or Clipboard features for copying and pasting text. 你也可以显示新快捷菜单中的对象，并不位于提供特定情况下不适合用于的命令以显示。You can also display new objects in a shortcut menu that are not located within a to provide control or the form itself. 可见的控件和具有将绑定的属性到显示的快捷菜单的控件的类。Visible controls and have a property that binds the class to the control that displays the shortcut menu. 可以使用多个控件。More than one control can use remarks.format: ## Remarks 在消息预处理以处理命令键过程中调用此方法。This method is called during message preprocessing to handle command keys. 命令键是始终优先于常规输入键的键。Command keys are keys that always take precedence over regular input keys. 命令键的示例包括快捷键和菜单快捷方式。Examples of command keys include accelerators and menu shortcuts. 该方法必须返回`true`以指示它已处理命令键，或`false`以指示该密钥不是命令键。The method must return `true` to indicate that it has processed the command key, or `false` to indicate that the key is not a command key. 仅当控件承载在 Windows 窗体应用程序或作为 ActiveX 控件，才能调用此方法。This method is only called when the control is hosted in a Windows Forms application or as an ActiveX control. 方法首先确定控件是否有，如果是这样，启用和来处理命令键。The method first determines whether the control has a , and if so, enables the to process the command key. 如果命令键不是菜单快捷方式，且该控件有父级，该密钥将传递到父级的方法。If the command key is not a menu shortcut and the control has a parent, the key is passed to the parent's method. 净效果是密钥上的控件层次结构"传"该命令。The net effect is that command keys are "bubbled" up the control hierarchy. 除了用户按下的键，密钥数据还指示哪些，如果有的话，同时按下修改键作为键的同一时间。In addition to the key the user pressed, the key data also indicates which, if any, modifier keys were pressed at the same time as the key. 修改键包括 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 键。Modifier keys include the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys.
